front.title: •Interrogation Array
front.gametext: Deploy on a prison. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each captive of ability > 2 here. Also, during your control phase, may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take one Torture or Aiiii! Aaa! Agggggggggg! into hand and reshuffle.
front.lore: Torture rack so visually frightening it sometimes yields the desired results without even being switched on.
